meanings: 훈남 refers to a man who is handsome and kind. It derives from the word 훈훈하다, which means to be warm or to be heartwarming, meaning that ...

vlive.korean: 좀 훈남! but also a warm guy. 듣기 View video tvN D : 언어의 온도 포스터 촬영현자아앙😝❣
훈남 매니저 누군지 알아요? Do you know who we're talking about? 듣기 View video TWICE : ㅠ
vlive.english: Do you know who we're talking about?

vlive.korean: 어떤 훈남이 이러고 다니니? What handsome guy goes around like this? 듣기 View video iKON : ㅎㅇ
vlive.english: What handsome guy goes around like this?

vlive.korean: 훈남 체대생 같다고요? I look like a handsome education major student?? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 190629 🐰
vlive.english: I look like a handsome education major student??

vlive.korean: [훈남(X) 미남(O)] [자아도취] 훈남 아니야? 훈남! [Handsome guy (X) Beautiful guy (O)] Aren't I a handsome guy? A handsome guy! 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐)_PAGE_09
vlive.english: [Handsome guy (X) Beautiful guy (O)] Aren't I a handsome guy? A handsome guy!

examples.korean: And not only that, you are a stone cold fox. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것 뿐만아니라 넌 훈남이기도 하지 User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 유루밍(girr****)

examples.korean: I walked into the coffee shop and sat a few tables away from “Mr. Handsome”. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 커피숍으로 걸어 들어갔고 훈남과 몇 테이블 떨어진 곳에 앉았다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 kcong94(kcon****)

examples.korean: I mean, he was the only young heartthrob on the scene last year and now I'm here. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 말은, 작년엔 그가 유일한 젊은 훈남이었지만 지금은 내가 있지(내가 제일 잘났지) User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 puer_senex(gmld****)

examples.korean: Stunning Lisa - who famously wooed Hollywood hunk George Clooney - was given a standing ovation after her early elimination. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 헐리우드의 훈남 조지 클루니에게 소문나게 구애했던 굉장한 미인 리사가 조기에 탈락된후 기립박수를 받았다.
